## Solutions

```python
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

# numpy
R = np.random.randn(250, 5)/100
mu = R.mean(axis=0)
Sigma = np.cov(R, rowvar=False)

# pandas
px = pd.read_csv("prices.csv", parse_dates=["date"]).sort_values(["symbol","date"])
ret = px.groupby("symbol")["close"].pct_change()
pivot = px.assign(ret=ret).pivot(index="date", columns="symbol", values="ret")
print(pivot.describe())
```
